title.en: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

description.de:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

description.fr:
Le monde est au bord de la destruction après une guerre dévastatrice de dix ans dans le « Labyrinthe des ombres ». Desir Herrman est l'un des derniers magiciens restants, mais il n'est pas assez puissant pour combattre l'ennemi fatal qui menace l'Humanité. Alors qu'il est certain que la fin est proche, il est renvoyé dans le temps, à l'époque où il étudiait la magie à la prestigieuse Académie Hebrion ! Grâce à cette seconde chance, Desir est bien décidé à sauver non seulement sa peau, mais également celle de ses amis et camarades perdus. Sachant déjà ce que le futur leur réserve, ses efforts pourront-ils faire la différence, ou bien seront-ils tous condamnés à revivre le même destin tragique ? Adapté du roman phare.

description.id:
"Agak disesalkan, tapi sebaiknya kita bersia-siap untuk mati!"
"Apa dunia akan benar-benar berakhir di sini?!"

Desir mengira semua sudah berakhir. Namun, ternyata dia kembali ke ujian masuk akademi hevrion 13 tahun yang lalu! Ia kembali berkumpul dengan orang-orang tercinta yang mati dalam dunia bayangan. Tiga tahun tersisa sebelum dunia bayangan muncul! 

"Kesempatan datang lagi, aku tidak akan kehilangan orang-orang yang kucintai untuk kedua kalinya!"

description.ja:
人類が迎えた最悪の災害、影の迷宮。 「デジール・アルマン」は影の迷宮の中で最後まで生き残った生存者6人のうちの1人である。 彼らは影の迷宮の最後のボスに挑戦したが、失敗し、世界は滅亡を迎えてしまった。 全てが終わったと思った瞬間、「デジール」の目の前に見える光景は…13年前の世界！？ 帝国最高の魔法学院、へブリオン学園の入学式に戻ってきた「デジール」 最悪の災害「影の世界」発生までの残りの時間は3年！ 過去を変え、強い仲間を集めて、世界を救えることはできるだろうか！

description.ko:
"다시 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!"

인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.
데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 
마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.
그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고
세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.

모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,
데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!

제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.
그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,
사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!

그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!
과거를 바꾸고, 강한 동료를 모아 세상을 구원하라!

description.ru:
"Теперь, когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть".
Лабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.
Дезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.

Шесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.
Однако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!

Дезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.

Остались три года до появления Теневого Мира! Измените прошлое и соберите могущественных товарищей, чтобы спасти человечество!

หลังจากทำภารกิจในโลกแห่งเงาไม่สำเร็จ 'เดเซียร์ เออร์แมน' ที่คิดว่าตัวเองตายแล้ว ได้กลับมาเกิดใหม่ในช่วง 3 ปีก่อนที่จะเข้าไปต่อสู้ในโลกแห่งเงา การกลับมาครั้งนี้ทำให้เขาพยายามเปลี่ยนแปลงทุกอย่างเพื่อช่วยเหลือเพื่อนและคนที่รักไว้ให้ได้มากที่สุด!

description.vi:
Desir vật lộn trong Mê cung bóng tối suốt 10 năm dài đằng đẵng, chứng kiến đồng đội và bạn bè lần lượt ngã xuống, mãi đến khi toàn đội cả trăm người chỉ còn vỏn vẹn 6 người thì mới đánh bại được kẻ thù chung. Những tưởng đã cứu được thế giới khỏi nguy cơ diệt vong, nào ngờ tai họa bất ngờ ập đến cuốn trôi tất cả mọi thứ. Lần nữa tỉnh lại, Desir phát hiện mình đã quay ngược thời gian trở về ngày đầu nhập học ở Học viện Hebrion. Liệu lần này anh có thể bảo vệ những người mình thương yêu và cứu vớt thế giới không?

description.zh-hk:
「既然已經回來了，
就不能再次失去心愛的人們!」

人類正面臨最可怕的災難——影之迷宮。
戴基爾．阿曼德是迷宮裡最後的6名倖存者之一。
他們試圖挑戰迷宮的最後關卡，
然而卻以失敗告終，
世界最終走向滅亡。

當以為一切已經結束的那刻，
戴基爾卻回到了13年前的過去?!

當時的戴基爾正要進入帝國最強的魔法學院——
赫布里溫學院就讀，
並且與在迷宮中逝去的珍貴夥伴們重逢。
為了拯救他心愛的人們與這個世界，
他決心要改變過去...!

距離影之世界出現的時間只剩3年了!
快召集強悍的同伴一同拯救世界吧!

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: Rabukome Manga ni Haitte Shimatta no de, Oshi no Make Heroine wo Zenryoku de Shiawase ni suru

altTitles.ja: ラブコメ漫画に入ってしまったので、推しの負けヒロインを全力で幸せにする

altTitles.id: Karena aku sudah masuk ke kedalam dunia manga romcom, aku akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk membuat Heroine yang kalah dapat bahagia.

altTitles.en: Since I’ve Entered the World of Romantic Comedy Manga, I’ll Do My Best to Make the Losing Heroine Happy

description.en:
In the world of a popular rom-com manga, my only mission as the friend of the MC is to make the losing heroine, Sei-chan, happy!

"I'll definitely make you happy. Please go out with me."

"W-Wait, what!? Y-You're being serious...!?"

The manga adaptation of the sweet rom-com from Kakuyomu starts now!
description.id: Seorang anak sma otaku mempunyai waifu yang kalah war, setelah pulang kerja part time ia pun membeli kebutuhan otakunya lalu dia di tabrak oleh truck-kun yang supirnya lagi turu dan malah reinkarnasi kedalam manga kesukaannya namun setelah sampai disana dia malah nembak waifunya sendiri!!?
description.ja: 大人気ラブコメ漫画の世界で、主人公の友人キャラになってしまった俺の使命はただ一つ。 劇中の負けヒロイン・聖ちゃんを幸せにしてあげることだけだ！ 「絶対に幸せにするから、俺と付き合ってほしい」 「ちょ、ちょっと待て!? お、お前、本気か…!?」 カクヨム発・話題のベタ甘ラブコメが、コミカライズで開幕!!
description.vi:
Tôi rất thích một bộ manga romcom.

Tuy nhiên, nhân vật mà tôi thích lại là một nữ phụ, một nhân vật không bao giờ có thể đến được với... nam chính.

Một ngày nọ, tôi bị tông bởi một chiếc xe tải và khi tỉnh dậy thì nhận ra mình đang vào vai người bạn thân của nam chính trong bộ manga romcom đó.

Như vậy, vai trò của tôi lúc này chỉ có một

"Tớ thích cậu, chắc chắn tớ sẽ khiến cho cậu hạnh phúc, Sei-chan!"

Chắc chắn, tôi sẽ thay đổi câu chuyện tình buồn của nữ phụ, và khiến cho cô ấy hạnh phúc!

altTitles.ja: ヨメガキッす

description.en:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.ja: 愛が重い地雷系ヴァンパイア

altTitles.en: A Land Mine Vampire's Overbearing Love

description.en:
The main character, Shin, works hard to support his older sister and younger brother. One day, on his way home from work, he meets a girl who claims to be a vampire, and she demands his blood...?

This is the beginning of a slightly exciting brand new love story!

---

Note: Serialized version of [the doujin of the same name](https://mangadex.org/title/fb83ba7a-6887-4c72-8d61-1c8d8ff8904f).

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!

altTitles.ja: ウイニング パス

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

altTitles.ja: 夜のまにまに

altTitles.fr: À la tombée de la nuit

description.en: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
description.fr:
**À la tombée de la nuit** 

La joyeuse et énergique Chika, le timide et silencieux Waya. Ces deux-là, qui sont le jour et la nuit, discutent chaque mercredi soir devant une supérette. À la tombée de la nuit, il se rapproche peu à peu. Une histoire d'amour de jeunesse !
description.pt-br: Chika é uma garota alegre e divertida, Waya é um garoto tímido e gentil. Os dois opostos se falam apenas na loja de conveniência na quarta-feira. Uma história de amor juvenil onde eles diminuem a distância lentamente durante a noite!

altTitles.ja: 恋チン!

description.en: Kami, who is gay, has given up on love. Despite not having anyone to share his cooking with, he always makes a ton of food. And along comes Waki, a good-looking TV announcer who hosts "Waki Travels: Waki's Happy Food Corner!" Although he's got no taste buds, he eats a ton and comments on the food he finds in people's homes. But he takes an interest in Kami's food and even goes to visit him at his workplace. While he's able to slowly open up to the big-hearted Waki, he's still unable to be true to his feelings when he's afraid of getting hurt again…

title.en: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei de Isekai Rakuraku Life

altTitles.en: Bottom-Tier Old Man, Living the Easy Life in Another World with Cheat Powers

altTitles.ja: 底辺おっさん、チート覚醒で異世界楽々ライフ

description.en: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world… This is the record of a man’s meteoric rise from the depths to cheat-level life in another world!

altTitles.ja: オトメの帝国

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

title.en: The Hero Who's Been Like This Ever Since Forming a Party with a Female Priest

altTitles.ja: 僧侶とパーティ組んで以来、ずっとコレな勇者さま

altTitles.ja-ro: Souryo to Party Kunde Irai, Zutto Kore na Yuusha-sama

description.en: Full color is later on...

altTitles.ja: はたらく魔王さま!

description.en: After being soundly thrashed by the hero Emilia, the Devil King and his general beat a hasty retreat to a parallel universe… only to land plop in the middle of bustling, modern-day Tokyo! Lacking the magic necessary to return home, the two are forced to assume human identities and live average human lives until they can find a better solution. And to make ends meet, Satan finds gainful employment at a nearby fast food joint! With his devilish mind set on working his way up the management food chain, what will become of his thirst for conquest?
description.ja: 勇者に敗れ異世界へ撤退した魔王サタンと腹心のアルシエルがたどり着いたのは、魔王をして常識を超えた超高度文明の世界、ずばり東京都渋谷区笹塚だった。この世界では魔王といえどお金がなければなにもできない。元の世界エンテ・イスラへ帰る力をたくわえるため、魔王改め真奥貞夫は、今日も幡ヶ谷駅前のマグドでアルバイトに励むっ！

altTitles.ja: 高森くんを黙らせたいっ！！

altTitles.vi: Đừng nghĩ thế nữa mà, Takamori-kun!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－トゥルス・レアルタ－

description.en:
"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization, an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity, observes a singularity. To solve it, Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004. The battle for the future of humanity has begun.

---
**Note**: This manga adapts the first, third, fifth, seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.
description.ru: Манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты: Фуюки, Орлеан, Океанос, Америка, Вавилония. Повествование ведется от лица Фудзимару Рицуке. 2015 год. В мире все еще господствует магия. Для сохранения своего рода человечество возвело научную лабораторию под названием «Халдея». Суть ее существования заключалась в том, чтобы наблюдать за миром при помощи той самой магии и достижений человечества. Благодаря усилиям ученых было подтверждено, что человечеству оставалось жить еще как минимум 100 лет. Однако «Халдея» зафиксировала некую аномалию, в результате которой наблюдаемая лабораторией область будущего внезапно исчезла. Все эти события привели к панике, и ученые принялись изучать полученные данные. Выяснилось, что в городе Фуюки в 2004 году существовала область, которая ни разу за всю историю существования «Халдеи» не попадала в поле ее зрения. Также подтвердилось вымирание человечества уже в 2017 году. По результатам полученных данных «Халдея» принимает решение задействовать программу «Рейшифт». Смысл - отправить группу специально подготовленных людей (Мастеров) в прошлое для ликвидации аномалии. Однако, в лаборатории происходит взрыв, и все Мастера оказываются в критическом состоянии. Одному из них, Рицуке Фудзимару, все же удается попасть в прошлое, где разворачивалась легендарная война за Святой Грааль. Теперь ему предстоит выяснить, что же на самом деле произошло, и, по возможности, устранить угрозу.

altTitles.ja: ハッピーセピア
ハッピーセピア: 大熊らすこ作品集

altTitles.en: Happy Sepia: The works of Okuma Rasuko

description.en: High school girl Kaede decided to travel back in time for her beloved benefactor, Minami. Let's see how her determination will change the flow of time. This is a time slip 4-koma manga connected by wishes and wills!
description.ja:
高校1年生のかえでは大好きな人のために過去へ旅立つことに。
彼女の想いがどう流れを変えていくのか…！
想いが想いを繋ぐタイムトラベル4コマ！

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

description.en:
A massive asteroid is about to hit earth!

Humanity has failed to stop a giant asteroid from plummeting into Earth, and life as we know it has ended. An ordinary Korean office worker named Cheolsu is somehow given the chance to go back in time and prevent this catastrophe from ever happening. Does he have a chance?

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

altTitles.ja: 榎本先輩は天使なんかじゃない

description.en: In the room of Hagino (university student), there is a ghost (?) of a man who was supposed to have died in an accident. That is Enomoto. Enomoto is the best friend of a senior student whom Hagino has a crush on, and is a bold man with a mean look in his eyes. Like the Grim Reaper, Enomoto declares, "If I can take my best friend's life within 49 days, I can come back to life in his place." A BL story of secret nemeses between an egocentric freeloader and a doggy-like landlord!

Growing up, Eun Hae-il is unable to forget the boy he had his very first crush on.
This year, he gets accepted into his dream college after retaking the entry test 4 times.
However, one day he saves a child from drowning in the ocean but, attempting to save him, he submits to exhaustion and drowns.
Right before he stops breathing, he closes his eyes and thinks of the boy he has longed had a crush on, but when then he opens his eyes again he's no longer drowning in the ocean, but on a bus.
Hae-il, a man who has crossed between time and has survived death, now stands in front of the man he has longed loved, Yoon Pado. “Has God really given me a second chance?”
description.fr:
"Eun Hae-il", est devenu adulte sans jamais oublier le garçon dont il était secrètement amoureux. Cette année-là, après avoir passé quatre fois le concours, il a finalement été accepté dans l'école de ses rêves. Mais alors qu'il sauvait un enfant tombé à la mer, il s'est épuisé et a été emporté par les vagues, au point de se noyer lui-même.

Alors qu'il fermait les yeux en pensant au garçon qu'il aimait tant juste avant de rendre son dernier souffle, lorsqu'il les rouvrit, il se trouvait dans un bus plutôt que dans l'océan.

Ressuscité après avoir traversé la mort et le temps, Eun Hae-il se retrouve face à son amour de jeunesse, "Yoon Pado".

Est-ce que c'est vraiment une seconde chance offerte par le destin ?

altTitles.vi: Vì Yêu Nên Hãy Để Tôi Đâm Cậu Đi

altTitles.ja: 愛してるから嵌めさせて

description.en:
Tomo and Hayami have been childhood friends since elementary school. Despite their contrasting roles - one a part-time worker and the other an elite trading company employee - their relationship remains as comfortable as it was during their school days. 

One day, Tomo witnesses his girlfriend exiting a love hotel with Hayami. Feeling betrayed by his girlfriend's actions, Tomo confronts Hayami outside his house. The revelation that follows is nothing short of shocking.

altTitles.ja: オシバナ！

description.en: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

description.en: Random short comics of or relating to Genya. Rather than uploading them separately, we've uploaded them all under one title for your convenience. If you like them, please consider showing support for the artist by purchasing the doujinshi or by retweeting/liking the comic. You can find links to the author's Twitter in the comments section or credits page.

Saotome is now left feeling awkward because the two actually had a pseudo-romantic relationship back then.

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 色尊し編

description.en: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.

altTitles.en: Different World Adventures Of A Lone Japan Ground Self Defense Force Ensign

altTitles.ja: ぼっち自衛官の異世界奮戦記

description.en: Jinguji Jo, an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force, who had just graduated from the University of Defense, was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!
description.ja: 防大を卒業したばかりの自衛隊幹部候補生・神宮司丈は交通事故により異世界へ転生。インベントリーにはなんと陸上自衛隊標準装備品が揃っていた！　ファンタジー世界を魔法よりも強い装備で無双するジングージ・ジョーの自衛官バトルアクション！！
description.pt-br: Jinguji Jo, um candidato à Força de Autodefesa, que acabou de se formar, reencarnou em um mundo diferente por causa de um acidente no trânsito. Jinguji Jo ganha a habilidade "inventário", onde permite guardar qualquer coisa, assim ele percebe que seu equipamento da força de autodefesa está lá. A ação de Jinguji Jo neste novo mundo é imprescindível, combatendo criaturas fantasiosas com equipamentos mais poderosos que a própria magia!!!

altTitles.ja: あ、それポンです！

description.en:
Fluffy Mahjong(?) Comedy!

The recently enrolled high schoolers Sena and Shiori are keen on joining the Mahjong Club, belonging to their senior friends: Natsume and Komachi. However! The Mahjong Club is at risk of disbanding! ...Reason being? That no one there can play mahjong!! 
Will they be able to remember the rules of the game before the club becomes disbanded!?

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ 総天然色

description.fr: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Valkyrie Apocalypse) arrive maintenant dans le monde du webtoon, dans un nouveau format reprenant l'histoire, mais avec plusieurs nouveautés ! L'histoire commence lorsque les dieux se réunissent en congrès pour décider de laisser l'humanité vivre ou mourir, et décident de détruire l'humanité. Mais une Valkyrie solitaire suggère de laisser les dieux et l'humanité se battre une dernière fois, comme dernier espoir de survie de l'humanité. 13 dieux affronteront 13 champions humains dans des combats en tête-à-tête pour décider si l'humanité vit ou meurt.
description.pt-br:
Agora Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Record of Ragnarok) chega ao mundo dos Webtoon, num novo formato recontando a história, mas com várias novidades!

A história começa quando os deuses convocam uma convenção para decidir se deixam a humanidade viver ou morrer, e decidem destruir a humanidade. Mas uma Valquíria solitária apresenta a sugestão de deixar os deuses e a humanidade travarem uma última batalha, como última esperança para a sobrevivência contínua da humanidade. 13 deuses lutarão contra 13 campeões humanos em batalhas um contra um para decidir se a humanidade vive ou morre.

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

Rai Genji always dreamed of being a top football player, especially one to play for Japan. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai needs to learn and adapt to the constant improvement of everyone else to hone his skills to a professional level. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he fall into the pit of losers.?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock knock-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

title.en: My Otherworldly Sisters Won't Hold Back!

altTitles.ja: 俺の異世界姉妹が自重しない!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Isekai Shimai ga Jichō Shinai!

description.en:
***Live free and be happy.***

―These were the last words of Amemiya Yuya's sister, who was seriously ill. Despite her wishes, however, Yuya, who was suffering from the same disease as her sister, was supposed to end his short life without fulfilling his promise. For unknown reasons, Yuya was suddenly reborn in another world. Confused by his new life, Yuya begins his life as the second son of a count. One day, Yuya thinks about the possibility that his younger sister has been reincarnated in this other world just like him. In this world, there is a sister, a young fiancée, a slave, a maid, etc. - but one of them is his own sister!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4696dd)

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

altTitles.ja: 天使禁猟区-東京クロノス-

description.en: The manga takes place after the story of Tenshi Kinryouku, but it is an independent work.
